title: Mermaid Melody sparkly rounded Bauhaus-like geometric face
content:
Hi! can you identify this text for me please.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202080031im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pichipichi-logo_6526.gif)
author: AwesomeNinaMasashiko

comments.content: I can not, but I do admire it.

That reminds me of a job we made in (I think) 1999 for Diesel:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202080031im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Proto_4181.png)

I made the Western fonts, and our Tokyo partners made the katakana versions. There were 12 variants.

And if I remember correctly, in Japanese that says: "purotokiddo".
